mapper.select: select v.id,v.pro_id,v.texture_results, v.algo_results,v.total_results,v.create_by, v.create_time,v.update_by,v.update_time, v.remark,v.delete_flag,p.material,p.material_code,p.so,p.item_no,p.order_qua,p.order_no, v.user_name,v.telephone,v.app_id,v.gender,v.position,v.user_phone_os,v.province,v.city,v.token,v.pic,v.model from honey_verify v LEFT JOIN honey_pro p ON v.token=p.token AND p.delete_flag=0 where 1=1 and v.delete_flag=0 and v.pro_id = #{proId} and v.create_time >= #{createTimeStart} and v.create_time <= #{createTimeEnd} order by v.create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO honey_verify ( pro_id, texture_results, algo_results, total_results, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, delete_flag, pic, user_name, telephone, app_id, gender, position, user_phone_os, province, city, token, model ) VALUES ( #{proId}, #{textureResults}, #{algoResults}, #{totalResults}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{deleteFlag}, #{pic}, #{userName}, #{telephone}, #{appId}, #{gender}, #{position}, #{userPhoneOs}, #{province}, #{city}, #{token}, #{model} )
mapper.delete:
UPDATE honey_verify SET delete_flag=1 WHERE id IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT v.id,v.pro_id,v.texture_results, v.algo_results,v.total_results,v.create_by, v.create_time,v.update_by,v.update_time, v.remark,v.delete_flag,p.material,p.material_code,p.so,p.item_no,p.order_qua,p.order_no, v.user_name,v.telephone,v.app_id,v.gender,v.position,v.user_phone_os,v.province,v.city,v.token,v.pic,v.model FROM `honey_verify` v left join honey_pro p ON v.pro_id = p.id
where 1 = 1 and v.token in (SELECT token FROM honey_pro where 1 = 1 and material_code = #{materialCode} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{createTimeFormat} ) AND YEAR(v.create_time) = #{year}
